name: -r
-R
options.description: Recursive. Attempt to remove the file hierarchy rooted in each file argument

options.name: -P
options.description: Overwrite regular files before deleting them

options.name: -d
options.description: Attempt to remove directories as well as other types of files

options.name: -f
options.description: ⚠️ Attempt to remove the files without prompting for confirmation

options.name: -i
options.description: Request confirmation before attempting to remove each file
